column3: ‚ÄúYou better get your wheelchair now, because you will need it. Smoked this bud with a friend at his trailer park while a bunch of senior citizens walked by, and they knew that we had that good good lmao. column3: ‚Äúthe SFV OG is a powerhouse of a strain and hands down one of the best LA OGs around, no question.  when acquired straight from the grower- this is some of the finest cannabis around.  the aroma is distinct and almost cologne-like, the flavor is full of earth tones with after tastes of the cologne smell.  the high comes on quick and grabs the patient by the back of the skull, warming the entire body and providing a lo...‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is a creeper...takes about an hour to really kick in.
And when it does get ready to EAT!! Total munchies. I was watching every food channel I could find.  
Great strain. Doesn't kick your ass , great if you are going out but want to be mellow.
I use it right before dinner and after that I can just kick back on the couch and relax.  Easy to go right to sleep.
I only smoke at night and this is a perfect fit for me...‚Äù

It wasn't necessarily a super energetic happiness, but more of a life is okay. keep on keeping on" kind of happy.
